name: A Tale of Middle Earth
description:
This is an RPG game in development. It's playable with endless enemies now. This game will continue to be developed.

Gameplay

You can select the player with the mouse and move it with the right click. If it come across with an enemy, it will begin to attack. You can use your skill with the number keys while fighting the enemy. Each time you kill an enemy, you gain an experience point based on the enemy's level. With this experience point, the player will level up and you can improve your player from the top right panel. As you level up, your new abilities will be unlocked. (for now, abilities are defined up to level 4)

Known Bugs

At game start, player starts with walking animation instead of idle animation.

Despite come across with the enemy, player can't switch from walking animation to combat animation sometimes.

Some known bugs when fighting the enemy.

Will be added soon

I will add an inventory system. Equipment, weapons and coins will drop from monsters. We will be able to improve our weapons with a blacksmith. New enemies, and enemy skills will be added. Abilities will be made more realistic. The map will be structured more simply. Feel free to let me know your opinions.
